text.0: swift to the purifying sieve flows soma as exalted law.
text.1: slaying the fiends loving the gods.
text.2: when soma pours the strengthening food a hundred everactive streams.
text.4: ten dames have sung to welcome thee even as a maiden greets her love.
text.5: o soma thou art decked to win.
text.6: flow hitherward o indu sweet to indra and to viṣṇu guard.
text.7: the men the singers from distress.
